website_summaries.verdict: One of the higher-rated games in the Star Wars franchise, this title allows you to train to become a Jedi Knight. Plenty of different settings and background art to keep you entertained.
pros: Star Wars fans are picky about their games, but this title is popular
Lightsaber responsiveness and gameplay are a lot of fun
Includes a memorable robot character, BD-1, to keep the game fresh
cons: Some players may not find enough thrills in this version

customer_reviews.title: Buggy...
customer_reviews.text: This review is not solely on the game itself, but the fact that I can't control the lightsaber. It would just stop working. I haven't even gotten past the 'tutorial'. This is in regards to the PC version. I am not sure if others are having a similar situation, but at this point, I want my money back. PS: It took me like 30 minutes just to find how to redeem the purchase code. Amazon's instructions are terrible. It would be fine for current gamers, but for someone who thought this game would be cool and bought it to check it out, it was a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: joshua mitchell

customer_reviews.title: No one asked for a puzzel game in the star wars universe
customer_reviews.text: Seriously this game sucks. I was expecting something like the force unleashed but of course ea messes everything up. first it takes forever to even use the force fully, battling stupid monsters along the way. Very little force battles, and once you finally rank your power ups the game ends. Wait to buy this game when it 15 bucks in the discard bin. not worth full price or even half the price. Disney and EA sucks
customer_reviews.author: michael kz

customer_reviews.title: Good story, pretty scenery/background, meh character models, bad combat, aweful download experience
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the story in the game. The non-character models (backgrounds and worlds) are fantastic. The characters models are mediocre. Combat is atrocious. The instructions for downloading the game were nonsense, there should be a link directly to the download, instead, I was pointed to a website and left to fend for myself. If not for my good search skills I would not have found the path through download (this is absurd and abusive, Amazon should offer direct download to their Customers as the Electronic Arts website is utter garbage).
customer_reviews.author: Pimpernel Sandybanks

customer_reviews.title: Delayed download of the game - EA should alert people not to expect quick access
customer_reviews.text: I paid for this game, got my product code to download it and spent 1 1/2 hours trying to get the game and finally contacted EA customer support. Another 45 minutes and no game. The CS rep tried to help me, but to no avail. I was able to download the game the following morning and all was well. I do not know whether they had a server problem or if this is normal for EA, but they should notify their CSRs if they have slow product access problems. Cancelling the order. I gave this 1 star, because you can't do zero.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: So far, this game has been awesome! I have played the previous games such as Jedi Knight, etc and I had high exceptions...until I saw who developed the game. I have put in about 15 playing hours and so far besides a little glitchiness and dropped frames here and there, the game play and story is awesome I would definitely recommend picking up this game. I use a 3800x/2070 super with 16g ram.
customer_reviews.author: eRRaTiC

customer_reviews.title: This is definitely a platformer
customer_reviews.text: This didn't feel much like the Star Wars universe, unless that universe is built in a almost exclusively vertically oriented manner. Get used to jumping/climbing/swinging/etc from one precipice to another. IOW a monotonous skyscraperesque playscape which accommodates the limited vision of this game's designers. The light-saber combat was entertaining though.
customer_reviews.author: Carrell R. Killebrew

customer_reviews.title: suprisingly good game thus far
customer_reviews.text: sometimes EA in the star wars francise can give you a good game
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Mcgovern

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: The code is to download from Origin. Such a terrible application. I tried repeatedly to download the game, and it doesn't work. No way to get a refund either from EA or Amazon as they won't call back. Such useless incompetence. DO NOT BUY the online game code!!! Update: Amazon did refund the game. No luck getting help from EA. Was on hold for over an hour with no one answering.
customer_reviews.author: 10man

customer_reviews.title: What a blast! My head got turned upside down!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I guess I am glad to say, that my expectations of EA got turned on their head ;) The graphics are amazing, but a solid and well thought out story also compliments that wonderfully. You can tell they put lot of effort and planning into the story and the details. Still playing through, kind of stopped it for a while but I've been lazy... need to finish the story, lol. It's been a blast so far though. I don't have anything negative to add here, at least that I can think of. Good job.
customer_reviews.author: Jin Peng

customer_reviews.title: Glitchy but fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun game, plenty to explore in the Star Wars universe. It has some glitches but they add some laughs , like passing through a stormtrooper with your lightsaber and your own body and nobody gets hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Tech97

customer_reviews.title: The Best Star Wars Game Since Outcast and Academy.
customer_reviews.text: The story, graphics, fighting, and bad guys were perfect. This is the best Star Wars title since Jedi Outcast and Academy. Will play a second time with xbox controller because first time was with keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Origin will not let you use controller
customer_reviews.text: The title says it all, and when you google how to use a controller on origin, most results recommend using Steam to get to your origin game to make the controller work. This did not work for me and now i'm thinking why did i not just use Steam to purchase my game.
customer_reviews.author: David Morris

customer_reviews.title: Download version sucks, buy it on disc!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The game play is great. My issue is I have to right click in Origin and repair the the game every time to begin playing. This is getting very old, and frankly I feel I should be able to get a partial refund for this issue. If you're planning on buying this game get it on disc, not the download version.
customer_reviews.author: Wigmaster0

customer_reviews.title: 5 WORDS. Best. Star Wars. Campaign. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Buy on Amazon for a great price! TRUE Star Wars fans get all the references and can really appreciate the hard work put into this game. Filled with many references to the Clone Wars, Rebels, and the Movies! The best way to describe it is, a "Force Unleashed-like", Dark Souls, Almost Skyrim-Type amazing Star Wars Campaign with many customization options and lots of exploration, lore, and surprisingly little sprinkles of humor into many different scenes. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TheSVGamer

customer_reviews.title: Good game, Horrible launcher
customer_reviews.text: This product ONLY comes with a key for the origin launcher. Not only does the game run better on Steam, but Origin is more inconvenient to use regularly and has little/no controller support. According to Amazon, products like this one are not applicable for refunds so now I have wasted 50 dollars buying an otherwise amazing game on a horrible platform. If you want to use a controller I heavily encourage you to buy this on steam
customer_reviews.author: Brian Winslow

customer_reviews.title: Help!! anyone
customer_reviews.text: After installing this game on my Brand new HP 'All in One' I quickly realized that no amount of monkeying in the gamer settings will allow this game to be anything other than SLOW!! Way Too Slow. This frame rate is Murder!
customer_reviews.author: Deidra

customer_reviews.title: Finally a great Star Wars game
customer_reviews.text: About time a decent Star Wars game came out. Very fun and quite a decent challenge on Jedi Master mode. Great story and even a greater ending. Make more of this Respawn and EA!
customer_reviews.author: Demetri

customer_reviews.title: A amazing addition to the Star Wars Universe.
customer_reviews.text: I played and beat this game in about 14 hours. The combat is incredibly satisfying and difficult and the story is well thought out and engaging. By far the best Star Wars game to come out since the Disney acquisition 8 years ago. It is a little glitchy at times but nothing game breaking, usually just weird and funny.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Amazin game
customer_reviews.text: Huge Star Wars fan, not extreme though. This game really gives the feel of being a Jedi, cant wait for a new version
customer_reviews.author: F. Melo

customer_reviews.title: Bought game but code does not work
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to playing the game. I bought the game and it gave me a code, but I was caught off guard when the code did not work at all. I have tried contacting EA, but they did not ever respond to me. It has been 24 hours and the code still does not work :(
customer_reviews.author: Peter Oh

customer_reviews.title: Not Steam version
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this is not refundable, and it does not provide a Steam code, only an origin code.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Oliver

customer_reviews.title: An amazing story and great gameplay
customer_reviews.text: This game is the best in the series in my opinion. A great story, amazing graphics, and compelling game play throughout. There are times when you will get stuck and get frustrated but once you get it down and get through it, it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: James Eismon

customer_reviews.title: Good Game
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend for Christmas and I didn't see him for weeks after. I guess he liked the game.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: This is a good game
customer_reviews.text: I had fun playing the game. It didn't last as long as I hoped though. I
customer_reviews.author: A happy guy

customer_reviews.title: BUILT MY SAVIS WORK SHOP SABER IN GAME!
customer_reviews.text: Building my custom Savi's workshop light saber brought the game to a new, fun experience. Tough at the higher levels, very fun and emmersive.
customer_reviews.author: Matt R

customer_reviews.title: Get it now!
customer_reviews.text: What an engrossing and captivating game! I really hope they create some dlc for ths!
customer_reviews.author: Kriton

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic game!
customer_reviews.text: The game itself was fantastic, and I really enjoyed it. However, the game was quite short. For anyone looking to get it, I would wait for a sale!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY DO NOT BUY DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Please, avoid this Origin version of the game. I cannot get the Origin client to install. I've since learned it Origin client software is a piece of junk and written by second-rate programmers. I wish I would have known better. Again, please do not buy this version.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Great story and great visuals. Extremely fun to play! Only complaint is the camera can get wonky sometimes during combat, but not that big of a deal really. Must play if you are a star wars fan!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: My son was thrown out of the game and it started all over.  He lost everything.  Help
customer_reviews.text: I need a refund. My son got a cool lightsaber and then was thrown out of the game. He had been playing for days and was very far along. There must be a glitch. He de installed and now is so disappointed. I need a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Joel T. Rathje

customer_reviews.title: Origin downloader sucks
customer_reviews.text: Please do not buy this product from amazon. Use Steampowered instead. The origin download platform does goes out every so often so that the full game can never be done downloading. The game however is amazing. Just use Steam though.
customer_reviews.author: ian calalang

customer_reviews.title: FANtastic!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing game! IMO, the best since Jedi Outcast. I think, however, it was designed with consoles in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Lawson Box

customer_reviews.title: Game’s prob. fine, but can’t download on EA Origin b/c of broken Windows 10 User Acct Control
customer_reviews.text: EA Origin is broken and won’t let me download the game. Get an error stating Windows 10 UAC needs permission, but no Windows dialog box appears to allow me to start download. Can’t play.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great story and done in true Star Wars fashion!
customer_reviews.text: Great game!!! Realistic Light saber battles and Impacts. I am very impressed in the detail taken to bring this game to life. I’m very happy I decided to buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: Rob W.

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought possible
customer_reviews.text: Combines all of the elements of my favorite games. Every fight is challenging enough, and the puzzles are fun. Run amazing on my CPU and looks gorgeous. I would sell the heck out of the game
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Very fun to play, slightly difficult at times, but very rewarding once you figure out how to defeat certain enemies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game, check the specs
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game! Would recommend making sure you check your pc specs in relation to the game specs. Order worked perfectly. It does require you to have an Origin account.
customer_reviews.author: Jack S

customer_reviews.title: Best Star Wars game in a long time
customer_reviews.text: Great fun game, if your a fan of Metroid Prime or Star Wars I recommend this game, great graphics, gameplay is fun, story is on point
customer_reviews.author: Jon Lebron

customer_reviews.title: Tomb Raider Meets Dark Souls
customer_reviews.text: If you like Star Wars, The newer Tomb Raiders, and Dark Souls, this should be a satisfying romp! VERY challenging on harder settings! Great game.
customer_reviews.author: Casey M. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game for my boyfriend he’s been playing for two days straight. Safe to say I think he really really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy
customer_reviews.text: Received my code quick and painless. All went according to plan!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Annoying Ending and Lack of after-completion content
customer_reviews.text: Great story, until the end. And to add on to the bad ending, you can't do much after you beat the game
customer_reviews.author: Branden

customer_reviews.title: I wish it could be played on epic games platform
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could have used it on epic games platform instead of origin
customer_reviews.author: Banksy

customer_reviews.title: Sunshine and Seashore
customer_reviews.text: "If Jimmy Cracked corn and you don't care. Who will?" - M. Gandhi
customer_reviews.author: Joselph

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic game for Star Wars fans, the saber play was great :)
customer_reviews.author: David LaGrave

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Game
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Game and easy to download and play without going to store
customer_reviews.author: Gamer

customer_reviews.title: Digital code and not a disc
customer_reviews.text: Loved the game and I downloaded and played the game instantly!
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 great game
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best star wars game out right now
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey dircks

customer_reviews.title: Single Player is not dead
customer_reviews.text: The best Star Wars game in a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Viso

product_meta.title: Star Wars Jedi Fallen Order - [PC Online Game Code]
product_meta.description:
Platform:PC Online Game Code| Edition:StandardA galaxy-spanning adventure awaits in Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order, a new 3rd person action-adventure title from Respawn Entertainment. This narratively-driven single player game puts you in the role of a Jedi Padawan who narrowly escaped the purge of Order 66 following the events of Episode 3: Revenge of the Sith. On a quest to rebuild the Jedi Order, you must pick up the pieces of your shattered past to complete your training, develop new powerful Force abilities, and master the art of the iconic lightsaber - all while staying one step ahead of the Empire and its deadly Inquisitors. While mastering your abilities, players will engage in cinematically-charged lightsaber and Force combat designed to deliver the kind of intense Star Wars lightsaber battles as seen in the films. Players will need to approach enemies strategically, sizing up strengths and weaknesses while cleverly utilizing your Jedi training to overcome your opponents and solve the mysteries that lay in your path. Star Wars fans will recognize iconic locations, weapons, gear, and enemies while also meeting a roster of fresh characters, locations, creatures, droids and adversaries new to Star Wars. As part of this authentic Star Wars story, fans will delve into a galaxy recently seized by the Empire. As a Jedi hero-turned-fugitive, players will need to fight for survival while exploring the mysteries of a long-extinct civilization all in an effort to rebuild the remnants of the Jedi Order as the Empire seeks to erase the Jedi completely.



System Requirements:

 * Operating System: Windows 10 
 * Processor:
 * RAM: RAM
 * Hard Drive: available space
 * Video Card: or better
 * Additional Requirements:

Origin account required to download and install.
feature_bullets: Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order delivers the fantasy of becoming a Jedi through its innovative lightsaber combat system striking, parrying, dodging partnered with a suite of powerful Force abilities you’ll need to leverage to overcome obstacles that stand in your way
As a former Padawan on the run from the Empire, you must complete your training before Imperial Inquisitors discover your plan to revive the Jedi Order.
Ancient forests, windswept rock faces, and haunted jungles are all unique biomes you’ll explore in Jedi: Fallen Order, with the freedom to decide when and where you go next.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars365 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
